title: Katy Perry and Luke Bryan reenact famous scene from Titanic filming for American Idol season 18
text:
American Idol is gearing up for a 2020 return.

Katy Perry, 34, and Luke Bryan, 43, were giving their best Jack and Rose impressions while filming a clip for the new season of American Idol at the Wharf waterfront in Washington, DC on Tuesday.

The pair are returning as judges for season 18 of the long running singing competition along with Lionel Richie and host Ryan Seacrest.

Ahoy! Katy Perry, 34, and Luke Bryan, 43, were giving their best Jack and Rose impressions while filming a clip for the new season of American Idol at the Wharf waterfront in Washington, DC on Tuesday

The stars were being filmed on the back of a large yacht and seemed to be reenacting a famous scene from Titanic with Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet.

Katy was seen with her arms outstretched on the back of the yacht soaking up the sun with Luke behind her, holding her waist.

They were flanked on all sides by camera men, crew members and audio tech's holding boom microphones for the big budget shoot.

The Roar crooner was dressed like a funky modern superhero in a bootcut black and navy jumpsuit that had a black sheer illusion neckline and cap sleeves with a sweetheart cut bodice underneath.

The look: The Roar crooner was dressed like a funky modern superhero in a bootcut black and navy jumpsuit that had a black sheer illusion neckline and cap sleeves with a sweetheart cut bodice underneath

Style star! The pièce de résistance was a flowing black sheer cape that was affixed to her slim shoulders with two stars

Her exciting costume was adorned with sparkling star appliques across the top and the pièce de résistance was a flowing black sheer cape that was affixed to her slim shoulders with two stars.

Katy is sporting a blond blonde bob these days and rocked a chunky pair of heels.

Meanwhile, her co-star was decidedly more on brand for his country vibe and kept it simple in jeans, an olive toned button-up and boots.

They're back! Katy will return for season 18 of the long running singing competition along with Lionel Richie, Luke Bryan and host Ryan Seacrest sometime in 2020

The Idol crew has been in DC for a few days now and the Prism singer spent some time sight seeing before she headed to work.

Katy checked out the Washington Monument, an obelisk on the National Mall built to commemorate George Washington, with her tea cup pup in tow.

She had fun as she attempted to get the perspective right of her holding up the massive tower.

Tourist vibes: The Idol crew has been in DC for a few days now and the Prism singer spent some time sight seeing before she headed to work

Later, the I Kissed a Girl singer posted a snap of herself in the fabulous floral frock she wore on Friday night to perform at the Silence the Violence concert.

Perry is set to wrap up 2019 with a bang. In addition to returning to American Idol in the New Year, she's set to debut new music this week.

On Monday, the pop star took to Instagram to let her 85M followers know there was a new tune, Harleys In Hawaii, that would be released on Wednesday.

The Grammy winner also shared a photo of the cover art which showed the siren on a Harley with palm trees on the sides.
